mapper.select: SELECT * FROM match_team_member AS mtm LEFT JOIN match_team_data AS mtd1 ON mtm.team_number = mtd1.team_one_id LEFT JOIN match_team_data AS mtd2 ON mtm.team_number = mtd2.team_two_id LEFT JOIN app_user AS au1 ON mtm.team_member_one = au1.id LEFT JOIN app_user AS au2 ON mtm.team_member_one = au2.id
